note.p: Education: Christ Church, Oxford (matriculated 1679); Queens' College, Cambridge; LLB (1684), LLD (1688)
Career: Advocate in Doctors' Commons (1689); Commissary of St Paul's; Official of St Mary's, (?Shrewsbury), Salop
Sources: Bulloch's Roll;Venn; Hunter; Foster; Squibb
Notes: Proposed by Nathaniel Vincent. Death date from Squibb
